document_data.name: House of Al-Klemari
document_data.mainbody: The '''House of Al-Klemari''' was one of the richest merchant families in [[Huzuz]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Base of Operations: The House of Al-Klemari was based out of the [[Warehouse District of Huzuz]].
document_data.History: The Al-Klemari specialized in the trade of arms and armor. In addition to selling their items, they had skilled artisans who took special commissions for unique weapons or armor. Orders were procured from their agents who were stationed in the [[Grand Bazaar]].
